Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Q Hotel Grand Cru Gdańsk in Gdansk (Gdansk City Center), you'll be minutes from Baltic Philharmonic Hall Gdansk and Gdansk Crane. This 4-star hotel is close to Arthur's Court and Gdansk Main Town Hall.

Rooms
Stay in one of 50 guestrooms featuring LCD televisions. Complimentary wired and wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming provides entertainment. Private bathrooms with showers feature rainfall showerheads and designer toiletries. Conveniences include desks and complimentary newspapers, and housekeeping is provided daily.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Take advantage of recreation opportunities including a sauna and a fitness center. Additional features include complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and babysitting/childcare (surcharge). Guests can get to nearby shops on the shuttle (surcharge).

Dining
Satisfy your appetite at the hotel's restaurant, which serves breakfast, lunch, and dinner, or stay in and take advantage of room service (during limited hours).

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include limo/town car service, a computer station, and express check-in. Event facilities at this hotel consist of a conference center and meeting rooms. For a surcharge, guests may use a roundtrip airport shuttle (available on request) and a train station pick-up service.


Pets allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is noon
Satisfy your appetite at the hotel's restaurant, which serves breakfast, lunch, and dinner, or stay in and take advantage of room service (during limited hours).
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

With a stay at Q Hotel Grand Cru Gdańsk in Gdansk (Gdansk City Center), you'll be minutes from Baltic Philharmonic Hall Gdansk and Gdansk Crane. This 4-star hotel is close to Arthur's Court and Gdansk Main Town Hall.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Baltic Philharmonic Hall Gdansk - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Central Maritime Museum - 0.4 km / 0.3 mi
Gdansk Crane - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Gdansk Shipyards - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
St. Mary's Church - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
Great Mill - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
Chlebnicka Gate - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
Gdansk Old Town Hall - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
John III Sobieski Monument - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Arthur's Court - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Johannes Hevelius Monument - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Gdansk Historical Museum - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Neptune's Fountain - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Gdansk Main Town Hall - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Wybrzeze Theatre - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi

The preferred airport for Q Hotel Grand Cru Gdansk is Gdansk (GDN-Lech Walesa) - 12.7 km / 7.9 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
